extendedInfo.description: iTrader 8 is a real-time trading application, which provides streaming quotes & charts of Forex and Stocks instruments, charts, access to ECN Kalitex, trade news and enables real-time trading in financial markets .iTrader 8 allows to trade currencies (Forex), stocks, commodities, indices, metals and agriculture instruments 24 hours 7 days per week, monitor trades in real time and place orders right from your mobile device. It supports both Demo and Real accounts and is fully synchronized with the desktop version.Demo-account is available for 180 days.To receive login and the password for operation on a demo-account it is possible directly from application, access to the real account - on a company site www.kalita-finance.ru

reviews.comment: The program is so-so. I more liked Swiss Forex
reviews.author: A Google User
